attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Without regard to party or politics the parliament of this country no longer represents the wishes or needs of the people.  Parliament continuously demonstrates its contempt for our wishes, privacy, and welfare, while at the same time preserving its own.  It has no understanding of the day to day lives of any its constituent. Its members consider themselves to be above the laws that govern the rest of us.  They are, as a body, unfit to govern this country.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
